With 90%+ of clients being socially or economically disadvantaged, speed matters. How is Ascendus thinking about underwriting technology?
tp: HyperVerge's AI can help Ascendus process more microloan applications faster, cutting review from 40 minutes to under 5 minutes, so loan consultants can focus on one-on-one guidance.
With 450+ lending companies using HyperVerge, we understand the compliance requirements of CDFI and SBA-approved lenders.
As Ascendus scales to $60M+ in annual lending across 49 states, HyperVerge can ensure consistent underwriting quality regardless of geography or loan officer.
ask: Paul, would Ascendus be interested in exploring how AI-powered underwriting could help serve more underserved entrepreneurs without sacrificing the high-touch experience?

name: BUSINESS BACKER
desc: Cincinnati, OH-based alternative business financing company founded in 2007, now owned by Enova International. Provided business loans, lines of credit, and MCA. Currently redirects new customers to OnDeck partner brand.

leaders.bg: Leads Enova International's small business financing division which includes The Business Backer brand.

news.h: The Business Backer Acquired by Enova International
news.d: The Business Backer was acquired by Enova International and integrated into its small business lending portfolio alongside OnDeck.

news.h: Business Backer No Longer Accepting New Applications
news.d: The Business Backer is no longer accepting new customer applications and recommends OnDeck for fast business funding.

ice: I see Business Backer is now part of Enova International's portfolio. How is the integration going, and is the team exploring new technology for the small business lending side?
icebreakers: I see Business Backer is now part of Enova International's portfolio. How is the integration going, and is the team exploring new technology for the small business lending side?
With Business Backer now under Enova alongside OnDeck, how is the combined small business lending strategy evolving?
The transition from standalone MCA provider to part of a public fintech is interesting. What's changed in the underwriting approach?
As Enova consolidates its small business brands, is there an opportunity to rethink the underwriting technology stack?
tp: HyperVerge's AI can help Enova's small business division (including Business Backer/OnDeck) streamline underwriting from 40 minutes to under 5 minutes.
With 450+ MCA companies using HyperVerge, we can help Enova standardize underwriting across its small business brands.
As Enova integrates Business Backer into its portfolio, HyperVerge can provide consistent AI-powered risk assessment across all product lines.
ask: Would the Enova small business team be interested in seeing how HyperVerge's AI could help standardize underwriting across Business Backer and OnDeck?

name: CAP FLOW
desc: Glen Rock, NJ-based private commercial lending platform specializing in invoice factoring, accounts receivable financing, inventory funding, and purchase order financing. Over $1B in working capital provided since 2009.

leaders.bg: Co-founded CapFlow Funding Group in 2009. The three managing partners bring 60+ years of institutional investment banking experience in credit and ABL markets.
Co-founded CapFlow Funding Group bringing institutional investment banking experience to the factoring and ABL space.

news.h: CapFlow Launches FactorLOC Product for SMB Financing
news.d: CapFlow Funding Group launched FactorLOC, a factoring line of credit between $50K-$500K allowing SMBs to draw working capital on-demand.

news.h: CapFlow Launches FactorOne Spot-Factoring Solution
news.d: CapFlow introduced FactorOne, a spot-factoring product for single invoices without long-term contracts or monthly minimums.

news.h: CapFlow Surpasses $1 Billion in Working Capital Provided
news.d: CapFlow Funding Group has provided over $1 billion in working capital to thousands of American businesses since 2009.

ice: Andrew, the FactorLOC and FactorOne products are innovative additions to the factoring space. With $1B+ deployed, how is CapFlow managing underwriting across all these product types?
icebreakers: Andrew, the FactorLOC and FactorOne products are innovative additions to the factoring space. With $1B+ deployed, how is CapFlow managing underwriting across all these product types?
FactorOne's spot-factoring without contracts or minimums is a unique offering. How does your team handle the higher-velocity underwriting that requires?
60+ years of institutional investment banking experience across your managing partners is powerful. How is that translating to the factoring market?
Serving businesses with $75K to $25M in monthly revenue is a wide range. How does CapFlow adapt underwriting for each segment?
tp: HyperVerge's AI can help CapFlow underwrite FactorLOC and FactorOne applications faster, cutting review from 40 minutes to under 5 minutes per deal.
With 450+ lending companies using HyperVerge, we understand factoring-specific underwriting (debtor credit, invoice verification) and can automate key steps.
As CapFlow's innovative products drive higher deal velocity, HyperVerge can ensure consistent risk assessment across factoring, PO funding, and inventory financing.
ask: Andrew, would CapFlow be interested in seeing how AI underwriting could help maintain speed as FactorLOC and FactorOne scale deal volume?

name: CLEARBANC
desc: Toronto-based fintech (now Clearco) providing non-dilutive, revenue-based financing for DTC e-commerce brands. Has deployed $8B+ to 8,000+ businesses. Offers fixed and rolling funding capacity plus invoice funding.

leaders.bg: Co-founded Clearco (formerly Clearbanc), deploying $8B+ in non-dilutive funding to 8,000+ e-commerce businesses. Dragon on CBC's Dragons' Den.
Co-founded Clearco and served as original CEO before transitioning to Executive Chairman to focus on strategic direction.

news.h: Clearco Triples Funding Deployed in 2024, Targets 50% Growth in 2025
news.d: Clearco tripled the amount of funding deployed in 2024 and was on track to grow another 50% in 2025.

news.h: Clearco Surpasses $8 Billion in Funding to E-Commerce Businesses
news.d: Clearco has deployed over $8 billion in non-dilutive capital to more than 8,000 DTC and e-commerce brands.

icebreakers: Clearco tripling deployment in 2024 and targeting 50% growth in 2025 is impressive momentum, Michele. How are you scaling underwriting to match that growth trajectory?

tp: HyperVerge's AI can help Clearco maintain its growth trajectory by cutting underwriting from 40 minutes to under 5 minutes per application as volume scales.

ask: Michele, as Clearco continues its aggressive growth, would you be interested in seeing how HyperVerge's AI could help scale underwriting capacity without proportionally growing headcount?

name: COAST FUNDING
desc: San Diego, CA-based non-bank funding source founded in 2020, providing business lines of credit, revenue-based financing, short-term loans, equipment financing, and receivables financing from $10K to $500K.

leaders.bg: CEO of Coast Funding, leading the San Diego-based non-bank funder committed to responsible lending with rates starting at 2.99%.

news.h: Coast Funding Launches as Responsible Business Funding Provider
news.d: Coast Funding positions itself as the only business funding provider committed to guiding clients to responsible funding decisions.

news.h: Coast Funding Expands Program Lineup
news.d: Coast Funding expanded its offerings to include business lines of credit, revenue-based financing, short-term loans, and equipment financing up to $500K.

ice: Matt, Coast Funding's positioning around responsible lending is refreshing in the alternative finance space. As you grow, how are you balancing speed with your responsible underwriting approach?
